name: Pitball: Winter Waifus
description:
Pinball-like arcade gameplay that demands smart and careful plays to rack up enough points to pass increasingly tricky levels. Completing levels will win over the hearts of cute waifus who are donning winter apparel.

The game has:
- Variety of unique and challenging levels.
- Wide array of hot winter-themed waifus.
- Highscore system to perfect your skills.
